overview: Straight to the Point Vol. 3 features two new guys on the cover and they are not to be missed. Check out the amazing Dylan McLovin as he gives Taylor Aims his nice long shaft in the opening scene. Clark Kent, Samuel, Brodie, Kenny, and the super hunky Riddick also pack this DVD full of action. Beautiful young bodies, great cocks, and hot action, what more could you want? Enjoy!
title: Straight to the Point Vol. 3
